rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open space with ample seating, entertainment area and central dining.
rooms.vastu_note: Placed in the South-west corner for positive energy.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to living room; designed with modern dining furniture.
rooms.vastu_note: Aligned with North-east direction for prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen with an island worktop, open plan design connected to dining area.
rooms.vastu_note: Placed in the South-east direction for energy flow.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Compact and functional living space for servants with attached bathroom.
rooms.vastu_note: Placed in the North-west region to balance service area and master privacy.

rooms.name: Service Lobby / Utility Room
rooms.description: Area for storage of cleaning supplies, tools, and housekeeping equipment.
rooms.vastu_note: North-east alignment supports cleanliness and efficiency.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious guest room with en-suite bathroom and balcony for natural light.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Grand entrance with ample foyer space and security door.
openings.vastu_note: Aligned to the North for inviting energy.

openings.name: Balcony Access - Master Bedroom
openings.description: Spacious balcony adjoining master bedroom providing a view and fresh air.
openings.vastu_note: East facing balcony to maximize morning light.

openings.name: Balcony Access - Bedroom 2
openings.description: Spacious balcony adjoining bedroom number two.

openings.name: Swimming Pool Entrance
openings.description: Separate entrance to the swimming pool area, ensuring privacy and ease of access.

openings.name: Balcony Access - Bedroom 3
openings.description: Spacious balcony adjoining bedroom number three.

openings.name: Balcony Access - Guest Bedroom
openings.description: Spacious balcony adjoining guest bedroom, ensuring comfort and space.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Expansive master bedroom with attached en-suite bathroom and balcony.
rooms.vastu_note: Placed in the North-east to promote relaxation and energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Functional bedroom with private balcony for fresh air.
rooms.vastu_note: South-east orientation to boost energy levels.

rooms.name: Balcony Space - Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional outdoor seating area adjoining the master bedroom.
rooms.vastu_note: East facing for morning light and energy.

openings.description: Spacious balcony adjoining master bedroom providing a view and natural breeze.

openings.name: Balcony Access - Bedroom 2
openings.description: Spacious balcony adjoining bedroom number two.

openings.description: Spacious balcony adjoining bedroom number three.

rooms.vastu_note: North-west for a quiet and serene space.

notes.content: Design follows local building codes and Indian residential guidelines, ensuring safety, ventilation, and structural integrity.
Placement of rooms is designed to maximize positive energy flow according to Vastu Shastra principles while considering the plot orientation.
